alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 25 at 2:05PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Snow showers with gusty winds and patchy blowing snow is expected Sunday through Monday morning... The next system will be moving across northern Nevada, mainly north of US Hwy 50, on Sunday through Monday morning. Snow showers are expected at times and southwest to west winds of 15 to 25 mp with gusts to 35 mph could cause some blowing and drifting of snow. In general, 1 to 2 inches of snow is expected through this Sunday morning in the valleys, with up to 3 inches in higher valleys and along mountain passes. Please use caution if encountering showers when traveling as roads could be icy with lowered visibility. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
